features: Rectangular bed tray table is a sturdy table for everyday use. Designed with curved-edged top and ample leg space for added convenience.

body.description: Serve your breakfast on this sleek looking featuring curved sides. Crafted of wood with a rich dark espresso stain, this bed tray has foldable legs for easy storage and handles to keep your treats steady.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Winsome Benito Tray Make serving a meal in bed easy and elegant with this Winsome Wood Benito Serving Breakfast Bed Tray. It is finely crafted of wood and features a beautiful rich espresso stain that will blend with many decor styles. This wooden bed tray has roomy handles to keep drinks steady and for added ease of use. Featuring a deep tray with a rim around to keep plates from slipping off during transport. Ideal for serving, breakfast, lunch and dinner. Plenty surface for your meal to be catered on. For extra convenience this tray has foldable legs, so it can easily be stored away when not in use or compact for a trip to the park to have a nice picnic setup. Whether you are treating a loved one to breakfast in bed or taking care of someone who is laid up, this tray will add a touch of elegance to meals and snacks. No assembly is required. This tray is fully assembled and ready to use. Specifications: Open dimensions: 24.4"L x 14.9"W x 16"H Folding dims: 22"W x 14.9"D x 2.9"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow!! Beautiful... Such a nice quality. Large enough for all my needs. Already put together. Can use legs to stand alone or keep legs folded and simply use as a tray. Beautiful dark wood. The bonus is definitely all that for this price tag. However, most were half this size for more money. I'm glad I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my mother in law for her bed. She loves to eat and read in bed and I thought this was the perfect tray! I love the foldable legs for easy storing under the bed when she isn’t using it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Relaxation, Rest and Recuperation
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful item love the color, size, quality, so very nice for keeping all items at your fingertips. Enjoying it so far match the decor in the bedroom. Recommend it highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in a pinch
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: FELL APART AFTER ONE MONTH.I needed something fast after having knee surgery. This came quickly and while it's not the most well made tray, it works and meets my needs. I use it for meals, using my laptop and other small projects while I'm healing up. If you're looking for something economical and don't care that it's not super fancy, then this is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2013
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product for use as a bed tray and as a floor-tray, meaning- sometimes I would sit on my floor (Hey, it's clean!) and want to have dinner without it becoming an utter mess.This product is absolutely perfect for my needs. It doesn't take up too much room when you fold it and put it away, so that's nice,The legs aren't floppy or anything, they definitely hold up even when my little dog jumps around it as if he was trying to trip it over,It's wide enough to hold up a drink and food, and even something extra. You can really serve someone an indulging breakfast in bed with this thing,It's not tall enough to serve as a little table if I'm sitting with my legs crossed ("indian-style")- then I would drop whatever's on it, so it's definitely not for that. But I can absolutely put my legs under it regularly and it's definitely tall enough.The most important thing you probably want to know about is how this product actually looks in real life:This product looks just like the picture. You might say it's a big more dark-dark-brown than pitch-back, but like many things that involve colors and hues, it's pretty debatable.It looks very chic and fancy, like it's very heavy weight, thought it's not too heavy to hold (I wouldn't hold it with just my finger, but it's absolutely manageable, and I'm very small and weak, so it's not at all too-heavy)Hope I helped you figure this one outI enjoy this product thoroughly. It does what it's meant to do the best way possible, and with some household chic added to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and roomy!
reviews.reviewText: Well made-really liked the color and the size is more than adequate for what I need-Pleased with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Tray That Doesn't Snag On Cloth
reviews.reviewText: I've had two of these trays for nearly a year. It's a nice rich black wood. It's a perfect color and shape for me, arrived on time and in perfect condition, so there was nothing to technical to complain about. The legs open and close with a smooth action, even with heavy food on it, it's not very hard to open it up once to get to the bed. The join system isn't so loose that the feet open up once you move your hand away from the base, but it's not so tight that you need a considerable amount of force to pull open the legs.The color and ascetics is exactly what I wanted. I ordered Winsome Wood Sedona Bed Tray Curved Side, Foldable Legs, Large Handle first, but was disappointed that the bottom of the legs were not smoothed, but rough which caused them to catch the threads in my comforter and pull them up. I needed something with smooth legs that wouldn't destroy my comforters and duvets. The bottom of these legs are rounded and smooth, so you can pull them across you bed without snagging a thread or causing a rip.I recently purchased a tufted ottoman for a coffee table, and have place one of these trays on top for a flat surface for food and drinks. It works really well for this purpose and is easy to lift off and away or move around the ottoman as necessary, the legs fold into the bottom of the tray perfectly leaving noting sticking out to snag on my ottoman. Overall, I'm really pleased with his tray and I'll definitely order it again. The price has dropped almost $5 since I last purchased it, and has made this tray an even better deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The look nice, but didn’t last long.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two trays. These were aesthetically pleasing and I thought I’d have them for years to come. They are made of wood, but not as strong as expected. The first tray broke and I successfully glued it back together. Then the second one broke into too many pieces, so i didn’t repair it. Then the first one broke again, so I threw them away. I had them for less than a year.
Good size, nice finish, good looking. Has collapsible legs, so I can flatten it and use as a regular serving tray as well.
La mesa está hecha de materiales que tienen durabilidad y funcionabilidad, todo con un diseño atractivo. Es lo suficientemente amplia como para colocar un desayuno individual completo. ¡Me encantó!
This is a great little tray for breakfast in bed. It’s the perfect size! It’s bigger then we expected which was a nice surprise.
Buen material, bastante funcional. Recomendable por el precio que se paga. Las patas se mantienen dobladas cuando se guarda. Buena altura para su uso.
Très bonne qualité, spacieux et solide
